website_summaries.verdict: A top-notch cube bookcase that offers immense flexibility.
pros: Comes with nine cubes that can be used to store books, shoes, clothing and other items
Made from plastic with SGS standard that ensures long-lasting durability
Flexible shape is strong and firm
cons: Not as sturdy as other cube bookcases

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay together! Please read!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build however if you need to move it even slightly the dividers move out of the holders and its so hard to get them back in place. I've had both types of 9 cubes and I was wanting something easy but I wish I would have just bought the wood one because now everytime I try to move it or a cubby is too heavy it falls out of place and it's frustrating. The cubbies are pretty durable though I'm just not satisfied with it falling apart with any type of movement.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and works great for lighter items.
customer_reviews.text: Great for putting light items on. Not very sturdy but works great for what I'm using it for. To organize my paperwork and small stuff in my room. Easy to put together..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Really satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble - directions weren't great but it's not too hard to figure out; just have to make sure that everything is snapped in. I needed some shelves to store some miscellaneous stuff I had (literally) laying around the house, as well as some books. Aside from the obvious caveat that this is not heavy duty stuff, the shelves do tend to bow a little toward the center - this isn't a big deal but it does make it hard to line up books.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Daniell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad instructions
customer_reviews.text: Once I went to the description part on amazon to see pictures of how to put it together it was so easy. The instruction sheet that it comes with is not helpful at all. Seems pretty sturdy. Bought 6 boxes for it, they fit perfect. We’ll see how it holds up to my boys over time.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Blevins

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to put together and very sturdy. I decided to use these to replace a bad bookshelf and I was shocked that it has held my books totally stable as well as a rambunctious kitten who launches herself off of it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: It went together pretty quickly after the first row
customer_reviews.text: It went together pretty quickly after the first row. Seems pretty sturdy, and it's really great for the price. My only complaint is that, for a perfectionist, the unit is a little irritating because the panels don't go on the way I expected they would. But it's together and isn't going to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. The three cubicles I have look very nice.  Will look better when I have all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased May 8th 2018. It did not come with enough corner clips to make the four cubicles as shown. I contacted C&A and requested 12 more corner clips. They said they would be sent right out. Have not received them yet and its now June 21st.
customer_reviews.author: special ed

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Couple of the shelves came with cracks. I expected it after reading some of the reviews. Not a big deal for us (we don't expect it to last too long). We use it to store clothes and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Vikram

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty good material and good for clothes or storage
customer_reviews.author: Albino Flores

customer_reviews.title: Clean and neat
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I actually have multiple sets in different rooms of the house. Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Miss A

customer_reviews.title: Great for toys!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Looks great and keeps toys organized. Definitely will purchase another
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Pack light products
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. 6 clasps were missing from package. I have to contact seller.
customer_reviews.author: EpicArtdeSign

customer_reviews.title: This is absolute crap, don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: The space in between is so big, it falls apart and the quality is awful
customer_reviews.author: Liliya S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, only took a moment. Very sturdy, surprisingly so. I love it and it was extremely unexpensive considering other shelving options.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I set it up taller and left a cube out, and it fits perfect in my closet. Very easy to assemble, a little tricky but much easier than I thought. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Checkerboard delight
customer_reviews.text: Was purchased as a bookshelf, but my daughter uses It for her music and movies. Goes well with her room color scheme. Sturdy and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: 빅방

customer_reviews.title: You will love finished product
customer_reviews.text: separation! Was great to have it finished but it did take longer than expected to make.
customer_reviews.author: Loliray

customer_reviews.title: Functional.
customer_reviews.text: Works, but isn't the sturdiest. Also shipped a six cube all black instead of the 9 cube black and white. Functional, but looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to move
customer_reviews.text: Review update: Manufacturer willing this send replacement parts! I'm very happy with the response. Not a strong product, I broke one just putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best purchase ive made in a long time. very happy with my purchase and will definitely buying more
customer_reviews.author: Mz.Dreya

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy. Very easy to put together and holds a lot more weight than you would expect it to. Excellent sizing for Lego baseplate displays. Also works very well with the folding fabric square baskets.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have ordered 3 sets of these and will only ever buy them! They are super easy to put together and you can decide the design.
customer_reviews.author: ABM

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these. I have one for every closet. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Youngs

customer_reviews.title: It was missing critical parts.
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with parts missing from the box. The missing parts are connectors, which means that one-third of what I paid for cannot be used.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A. Neumann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They are simple and they are so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Edward Akinyemi

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Used to organize and store shoes in bins. Saves a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Stylenista

customer_reviews.title: We both love it.
customer_reviews.text: Using to keep my sons abundance of stuffed animals off the floor. We both love it.
customer_reviews.author: lissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and perfect for my little ones toys and books
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, great quality and not extremely bulky. Great for kids room organization! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: NOT STURDY AT ALL AND DID NOT HAVE ENOUGH CONNECTORS
customer_reviews.author: donna ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, holds books well, a little difficult to put together
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Camper storage
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. I own a teardrop camper and needed something light, flexible in design and durable for storage in my camper. It worked great. Easy to construct. I constructed six of nine cubes and used the extra "walls" as doors to keep items in cubes during travel. I wish they came in variable sizes. I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent size, great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, fits the foldable cloth baskets perfectly. Its a bit hard to piece together, and ive made some mistakes while putting this together so it was very hard to remove the connectors. With that said, it will definitely hold up! I bought this for my kids room to hold clothes, toys, etc. Its good enough to consider buying more for other rooms. I did not have to worry about buying a wooden cube shelf and risking broken or chipped pieces. Very worry free as far as that goes. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Sev101

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my yarn and crochet equipment. I absolutely love this item. It makes everything so neat and pretty. My room has so much more room in it as well. I would recommend this product to those who do art and crafts for ever if you want to store shoes as long as they are not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: For what they cost it is decent, I bought for my kids books and there is no way they will handle the weight so we repurposed for some of their stuffed animals and lighter toys and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Much more sturdy that I thoughr
customer_reviews.text: Much more sturdy that I thoughr! Perfect for my need of organization in my walk-in closet. I made it two rows instead of 3.
customer_reviews.author: LELA

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy
customer_reviews.text: Can't argue with the price. Needed something for toys in my twins room. This works perfectly. Easy to put together. You only need common sense lol wish i could gave configured it differently color wise. More black panels perhaps. All in all a pretty great cgeap product. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan trembley

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy. The configuration didn’t work for my closet of not I would keep it. Sturdiness is good for couple items nothing heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I used these to create partitions in my C&C rabbit enclosure. Rabbits can smell each other but not touch or see the other.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and fits our need.
customer_reviews.text: This cubed shelving unit was great. It was easy to assemble, did not wobble, not cheap looking and adds a modern look to our room.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy J MacFeat

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was going to be a hard plastic but still looks and works good. I like you can make different shapes and combinations.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two boxes. The first thing I used for clothes to make more room In my closet. When you measure your area be sure to add a quarter inch To the width. It worked out great for my clothes and it also worked out Great for my crafts. I didn't think it would be sturdy enough for my crafts But it's worked out wonderful. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to be set up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. It's very easy to assemble, and its perfect to be used to organize lego shows. my sons like them. maybe not very good for putting books, cause its matrial not too hard not too strong, but for toys , its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Key Yao.

product_meta.title: C&AHOME Cube Storage Organizer, 9-Cube Shelves Units, Closet Cabinet, DIY Plastic Modular Book Shelf, Ideal for Bedroom, Living Room, Office, 36.6" L x 12.4" W x 36.6" H White Cross
feature_bullets: ENOUGH STORAGE SPACE : The storage cube has enough storage space , can store all sort of items what you want: such as books, clothes, toys, artcrafts, decorations and more, this storage unit is perfect for living room, bedroom, kids rooms, home office, cubby closet or entryway

HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Made up of high quality ABS connector and PP plastic panel, this cube organizer will be harmless to both you and your pet; waterproof , easy to clean, 11 lbs load-bearing on each cube, easy to move around

LARGER STORAGE SPACE: The size of each cube is 11.8 x 11.8 inch, providing large space to hold more things, the product size is 36.6”L x 12.4" W x 36.6" H, please note: it fits storage bins that is smaller than 11 x 11 inch

ENJOY DIY FUN: Simple and light in structure, it is easy to assemble and disassemble; within provided accessories, this storage shelf can be assembled in different shapes according to your preference (refer to instructions)

SATISFACTION: Customer service 24/7 staning by, ensure warm and effective pre-sale and after-sale service. Free replacement for broken parts within 1 year after receiving the product. We are always available to provide a friendly customer service pre-sale and after-sale service, so don't wait any longer and enjoy it right now
